subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Santiago Botero returned from the doping charges that sidelined him from European competition last year to win the Tour of Colombia yesterday in Bogotá. The 34-year-old Botero won the 15-stage race by 4 minutes 45 seconds over Hernán Buenahora. Botero was dropped by the Swiss-based Phonak team last year for his involvement in a Spanish doping investigation that implicated 56 cyclists. Botero was cleared by Colombia’s cycling federation in November.
